channel.title: Real 317 Server Development [5%] [Project Old School] [Pics]
channel.description:
[IMG]http://img682.imageshack.us/img682/2823/sigcw.png[/img] ^-Default banner for now.
Hello, many people prolly saw i wanted to work on a REAL 317, so i went to special places and got a clean 317 deob, only editted to connect, and i got a crash patched version of Cheezescape. This will be done solo and also help of a friend on msn, i also have school so it may not get updated exactly EVERY day, so be patient. This does load a 317 cache, old fally, no fire capes etc, for all you noobs who think "whats so special about a 317, everyone uses it).
I WILL NOT add ANY customs i will NOT add Godswords, NPCS, or add firecapes/furies etc, this isn't what this server is hopefully going to be developed for.
I only JUST got everything today, Dec 14.
UpdateLog:10% Dec14.
Removed Summoning interface Removed Summoning loading Removed Summoning Skill Fixed "Attack" to only appear when in wildy or duel arena. Corrected some names of teleports etc. Removed a bunch of useless commands and lines Fixed moving water Removed the "Stats" option and made it owner only for obvious reasons. Corrected hit ratio's on pvp and npc combat. Corrected a small wildy level glitch - still need to fix another one.
Objective Log:
Add specials - 0%
Fix Tele-other (nulling character loading after accept) - 0%
Add training - 0%
Correct Npc/Player Facing during combat - 0%
Correct Npc Anims - 0%
Fully working RS Barrows - 0%
Remove 100% all commands except for ban, mute, etc. - 50%
Get mage bank tele. - 0%
Get KQ Working - 0%
Get Combat working - 10%
Get Npc Combat Fixed - 5%
Get correct timers - 1%
Fix Npc following when target dies - 0%
Add Next-Till Npc to attack - 0%
Add Range and Mage Following - 0%
Add Anim/gfx system to teleports - 0%
Check/Fix range / mage system (havn't tested) = 0%
Convert my delta antiflooder to this (if need be) - 0%
Client Objects:
Add custom MenuFrame - 0% Add Music Player - 0% Add Ip Changer - 0%
Dec14: [IMG]http://img695.imageshack.us/img695/74/091213230605.png[/img] [IMG]http://img704.imageshack.us/img704/4363/091213230554.png[/img] [IMG]http://img19.imageshack.us/img19/1687/091213225859.png[/img] [IMG]http://img704.imageshack.us/img704/1534/091213225524.png[/img] [IMG]http://img13.imageshack.us/img13/5425/091213225652.png[/img] [IMG]http://img695.imageshack.us/img695/118/091213225453.png[/img] [IMG]http://img13.imageshack.us/img13/5220/091213225607.png[/img] [IMG]http://img199.imageshack.us/img199/5220/091213225733.png[/img]

item.title: Real 317 Server Development [5%] [Project Old School] [Pics]
item.dc:creator: @jc22493 Jc22493
item.description:
@jc22493 wrote:

[quote=“faded vision, post:10, topic:319608”][quote author=Jc22493 link=topic=416080.msg3061719#msg3061719 date=1260913783]

Get your facts straight Jc, your flaming is getting old.

I am not flaming. I am merely stating a fact. Don’t be offended, sir. I deeply apologize.
[/quote]
Just because I posted a delta project on moparscape 6 months ago that epicly failed, doesnt mean its the only source I have ever worked with okays.

I have worked with countless deobs, and rarely do I not download new releases.[/quote]
I deeply apologize.

Read full topic
